snippet: A Muslim and community activist in Jackson Heights is encouraging other Muslims to practice yoga, putting himself squarely against those who consider it a sin.
abstract: Muhammad Rashid, a Muslim and community activist in Jackson Heights, Queens, is encouraging other Muslims to practice yoga, putting himself squarely against first-generation Muslim immigrants who consider yoga to be Hindu worship and a sin against Islam.
lead_paragraph: A Muslim and community activist in Jackson Heights is encouraging other Muslims to practice yoga, putting himself squarely against those who consider it a sin.

headline.seo: In Queens, Seeking to Clear a Path Between Yoga and Islam
headline.main: Seeking to Clear a Path Between Yoga and Islam
headline.print_headline: Seeking to Clear a Path Between Yoga and Islam
